conbody.p:
XLIFF Manager works on these Operating Systems:
Microsoft Windows 10 and 11
macOS Big Sur (11.0), Monterey (12.0), Ventura (13.0), Sonoma (14.0) and Sequoia (15.0)
Linux for 64-bit x86 (Intel/AMD) processors
conbody.note: XLIFF Manager installers for Linux are built and tested on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. The installers are not tested on other distributions.
